I guess so but keep the cord between them connected.

wants so
> much to be useful...

still

then

Lunarpine
> > > > knew

communicate

> > > > > "I'm your focus point, you see me as I was because I 
focused on
> > you
> > > > > directly." Piston let his gaurd down, sudenly he sensed why 
the

> > prevent
> > > > the
> > > > > obvious
> > > > >

he'd
> > just

WITH

adjustor
